subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Djokovic avoided becoming the latest seeded player to lose at the Shanghai Masters, rallying past No. 85 Mikhail Kukushkin, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4, in the third round. Federer also advanced.
snippet: Djokovic avoided becoming the latest seeded player to lose at the Shanghai Masters, rallying past No. 85 Mikhail Kukushkin, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4, in the third round. Federer also advanced.
